title: Services
text: FTW provides a range of technology services to help Fruita residents and businesses with their tech needs:

title: Services
text:
Get a Free Quote
Contact us to discuss your tech needs and get a free quote:

title: Need Tech Help? Contact FTW!
text:
Quick Contact
 Call or Text: (720) 213-6374
 Email: help@fruitatechwizard.com


Free Quotes
Just reach out with a description of your tech issue, and we’ll get back to you with a free quote!

title: Fruita Tech Wizard
text:
Need help with your computer, phone, or home technology? FTW is here to help! Based in Fruita, we provide friendly, personalized tech support for local residents and businesses.

What We Do

Computer troubleshooting and repairs
Phone and tablet support
Home WiFi setup and optimization
Smart home device installation
Small business IT services
AI and ChatGPT training
General tech advice and guidance







New: AI Training Services!



Learn how to use ChatGPT, LLMs, Generative AI (GenAI) and other AI tools effectively and safely. Whether you’re curious about AI for personal use or want to integrate it into your business, we offer friendly, hands-on training tailored to your needs.




Why Choose FTW?

Local, trusted service
Clear communication
Fair pricing
Free quotes
Within biking distance in Fruita!



Contact Us
 Call or Text: (720) 213-6374
 Email: help@fruitatechwizard.com
Free quotes available - just call, text, or email!
